Utilizando tecnologías como entity frame: Using technologies such as entity framework, in the construction of micro-services.
descripcion: Self-taught, as long as I have internet I am always looking for topics related to computing I can learn, this has always led me to do a little of everything and not specializing in anything in particular in relation to programming. As a result it gave me the ability to switch and adapt from one system to another very quickly, I'm not a fan of any particular language or system
Utilizado para construir interfaces medi: Used to build interfaces using Swing. Currently used to program under Android technologies
Utilizado a para la contruccion de BFF(b: Used for the construction of BFF (back-for-front) for the development of micro-services architectures.
Como lenguaje base para programar logica: As a base language for programming business logic in the creation of STORE-PROCEDURE
Desarrollador Backend con experiencia en: Backend developer with experience in multiple technologies
Me especializo en la creación de aplicac: I specialize in creating robust and scalable applications.
Se programo un micro-controlador arduino: An arduino microcontroller will be programmed to act as a controller for an electric oven allowing its temperature to be controlled.
Prototipo de gestion y control de prensa: Prototype of management and control of hydraulic presses.
Se programo un micro-controlador arduino: An arduino microcontroller will be programmed to manage cooperation and work through magnetic sensors of a hydraulic press, used in the manufacture of doors.
Maestro de robotica para los cursos de 5: Robotics teacher for 5th and 6th grade courses
Enseñé robótica a niños de 5to y 6to año: I taught robotics to 5th and 6th year children in the AREYA National Robotics Plan. It was a rewarding experience to see them get involved in building and programming robots. I developed pedagogical skills and learned to adapt my teaching to the needs of each student. Working at AREYA was an enriching experience that helped me grow personally and professionally.
Desarrollador freelance y luego como emp: Freelance developer and then as an employee at a software factory called Squad
Como desarrollador de diferentes proyect: As a developer of different projects using various technologies of my profile
Actualmente trabajando para Galicia-Segu: Currently working for Galicia-Seguros in the creation of platforms oriented to insurance management.

experiencia_cursos.descripcion: I took a crash course from a company called Alkemy where they built a website using .NET technologies.
